name: Colourny
description:
Welcome to Colourny, the fresh and exciting colouring-in colony sim! Build pipes and machines on a blank alien world to transport and process multicoloured goo! You can shape this world into whatever your heart desires, using a number of helpful tools.

Controls:

  • W, S, A, D keys control the camera. Arrow keys work too!
  • Everything else is done with the mouse!

Features:

  • Rich 14-colour palette!
  • Advanced fluid logistics network simulation!
  • Expansive procedurally-generated map!

Share your worlds with your friends!

Made for the #RainbowJam17 game jam.

Code: @DrMelon
Art: @tackyvillain
